metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34520 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Radare2 v5.7.2 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference via thefunction r_bin_file_xtr_load_buffer at bin/bfile.c. This vulnerabilityallows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DOS) via a crafted binaryfile.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
